results.title: PAIT-Survey Follow-Up: Changes in Albuminuria in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Mild-Moderate Chronic Kidney Disease.
results.text_hl: METHODS: We analysed data from 668 unselected @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ from the PAIT survey (mean age 60.4 +- 10.2 years, prevalence of males 38%), with and without @<m>DISEASE_Albuminuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@, maintained for 6 months with the previous treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@amlodipine-valsartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_amlodipine_perindopril_drug_combination @CHEMICAL_MESH:C542336 @@@amlodipine perindopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_lercanidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060343 @@@lercanidipine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@-@CHEMICAL_trandolapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052035 @@@trandolapril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nitrendipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009568 @@@nitrendipine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Felodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015736 @@@felodipine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Albuminuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@Albuminuria@@@ was assessed, as urinary @GENE_ALB @GENE_213 @@@albumin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ ratio, using a Multistic-Clinitek device analyzer.

citations.NLM: Fici F, Ari Bakir E, Ilkay Yüce E, Kanuncu S, Makel W, Tarim BA, Robles NR. PAIT-Survey Follow-Up: Changes in Albuminuria in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Mild-Moderate Chronic Kidney Disease. High Blood Press Cardiovasc Prev. 2020 Feb;27(1):43-49. PMID: 31916208
